Text: Is this the upcoming release which hasnt been touched up and is non anomorphic?

Is PAL, is the new DVD release and is anamorphic. The original film in the theatres years ago now in DVD.

- Reduction Level for DVD-5: 67,9%
- Overall Bitrate : 4.683Kbs
- Space for Video : 3.984.670KB

so does this include the full screen version, or not? and does it have any extras like commentary?
thanks anyhow :)

audio only english and spanish, no extras included.

yes, sorry is not anamorphic, but isn't full screen.

Great CONTRA2.
Any chance that you could scan the items I mentioned and post them as I torrent or email me them, younso at hotmail.com?

thanx for the heads up contra2... will wait until a release with just english audio is out there and no subs so best picture quality is obtained...

It does not fit on to a dvdrw according to Nero! People you might have to load it into DVD Shrink and shrink it a little bit (I think DVD Shrink says 0.7%). CONTRA2, I might suggest that next time you just take the original disc, load it into DVD Shrink which will automatically shrink the DVD9 to a DVD5.
Heh, has Lucas FINALLY released this on DVD!?  It's about time, FFS!  This I gotta see!...

For those of you who want to burn this I reccommend a program like CloneDVD or CloneDVD2 that can strip audio out. 

Remove at least one language from the main movie and there's no problem burning this disc.
